hero.title: Hi, I'm Jocelyn
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: I build modern, high-performance web applications with Next.js, TypeScript, and React. Turning complex problems into elegant solutions.

paragraphs.intro: Hello! I'm Jocelyn Sainson, a passionate Full-Stack Developer with expertise in building modern web applications. I specialize in creating responsive, high-performance solutions that solve real-world problems.
paragraphs.skills: With a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies, I enjoy working across the entire development stack to deliver seamless user experiences and robust application architectures.
paragraphs.hobbies: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing my knowledge with the developer community.

skills.title: What can I do for you ?

projects.subtitle: A selection of my recent work, showcasing my skills and experience in web development.

exoskel.title: Exoskel
exoskel.description: A complete boiler plate for a full-stack application with Next.js, TypeScript, Prisma, and Tailwind CSS.

error.generic: An error occurred while sending your message.

2017.title: My first steps in the real world
2017.text: In 2017, driven by a determination without fail, I decided to leave the traditional school system to plunge into the professional world. Becoming a bartender was my first great adventure, allowing me to develop skills in communication and stress management that no classroom could have taught me.

2020.title: When the crisis becomes an opportunity
2020.text: 2020 has changed everything. With the COVID-19 pandemic and the closure of establishments, my world collapsed in a few days. What seemed like a catastrophe turned into a period of deep introspection. I began to explore different professional paths, determined to transform this crisis into a stepping stone to a future that would really excite me.

2021.title: The art of persuasion
2021.text: In search of my true vocation, I embraced a career in commerce for a year. This experience proved to be a true learning laboratory. Each negotiation, each successful sale taught me the importance of active listening and problem-solving. Although this path was not my final destination, it offered me invaluable skills and clarified my professional aspirations.

2022.title: The digital revelation
2022.text: 2022 marks a turning point in my journey: the immersion in the IT world and the development industry. What started as a simple curiosity quickly became a consuming passion. Each line of code written, each problem solved reinforces my conviction that I have finally found my path.

timeline.title: Who am I ?
timeline.description: Heres a timeline of my life.
